name: Galactic Conquest Saved Game
summary: Learn about .GC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: GC files are stored within the \​GameData\​SaveGames directory of a Star Wars Battlefront 2 installation.

description: Saved game file created by Galactic Conquest, an outer-space strategy game included with Star Wars Battlefront 2; contains game information, such as the state of planets, airship fleets, and currencies; can be used to save progress for the Empire, Republic, CIS, or Rebellion factions.
